snippet: A piano seen in the film “Casablanca” was sold on Friday for $602,500, well below the value of what Sotheby’s, the auction house, had estimated before the sale.
abstract: Piano seen in the film Casablanca is sold by Sotheby's for $602,500, well below the value estimated by the auction house before the sale.
lead_paragraph: A piano seen in the film “Casablanca” was sold on Friday for $602,500, well below the value of what Sotheby’s, the auction house, had estimated before the sale.

headline.seo: A Piano From ‘Casablanca’ Is Sold for $602,500 at Sotheby’s
headline.main: ‘Casablanca’ Piano Is Sold for $602,500 at Auction
headline.print_headline: ‘Casablanca’ Piano Is Sold For $602,500 at Auction
